pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting Autoregressive Censored Mixed-Effects Models // It fits left, right or intervalar censored mixed-effects linear model with autoregressive errors of order p using the EM algorithm. It provides estimates, standard errors of the parameters and prediction of future observations. Florin Vaida and Lin Liu (2009) doi:10.1198/jcgs.2009.07130.
